DOC.brief_title: Time Gain Diagnosis Myocardial Infarction Troponin Point Care Testing Emergency Room
DOC.detailed_description: Thoracic pain cause myocardial infarction . The diagnosis myocardial infarction make ECG ( ST-elevation myocardial infarction , STEMI ) . However , myocardial infarction also occur without ST-elevations ECG ( non-ST-elevation myocardial infarction , non-STEMI ) . In latter case , quick acquisition blood troponin level necessary coin diagnosis initiate treatment . Therefore , investigator prospectively want compare 3 clinical test measure blood troponin level patient present emergency room thoracic pain probably related non-STEMI regard time necessary obtain test result . The 3 test : 1 . A laboratory base test : Roche Cobas E 602 2 . A point care test : Radiometer AQT 90 Flex 3 . A point care test : Philips Minicare I-20 The measure timeframe time venipuncture point test result know .
